name: Error
desc: Information about an error that occurred while processing a request.

items.name: code
items.desc: The code for this error. For possible values, see HTTP Status Codes.

items.name: detail
items.desc: A long, possibly localized, description of the problem.

items.name: id
items.desc: A unique identifier for this occurrence of the error.

items.name: source
items.desc: An object containing references to the source of the error. For possible members, see Source object.

items.name: status
items.desc: The HTTP status code for this problem.

items.name: title
items.desc: A short, possibly localized, description of the problem.
